productPages.hideAddToCart: Hide the Add to Cart button on product pages
productPages.hideBuyNow: Hide the Buy Now button on product pages

pages.disableHomePage: Disable Releasit on your home page
pages.disableCollectionsPage: Disable Releasit on your collections pages

products.enableSpecific: Enable your form only for specific products and collections
products.disableSpecific: Disable your form for one or more products and collections

countries.enableSpecific: Enable your form only for specific countries
